column2:
"I see... I need to first aim for the core
which is its weakness. Thereafter strike
at the weakness area when it is exposed."

"I think I can defeat it this way.
If I see it next time, I will go for it."

"You are great as I have expected.
I really think so."

"I would seek your advice again soon.
Thank you once again for your help."

"なるほどな……
まずは弱点のコアを狙うってわけか。
そして弱点を露出させて、叩く。"

"これなら確かに倒せるかもしれない。
次に会った時は真っ先に狙うよ。"

"やっぱ、センパイは凄いな……
ホント、そう思うよ。"

"またさ、相談に乗ってくれよな。
ありがとな、センパイ。"
